TopicTitle: Allow action group renaming and list in vessel description

Articles.Content:
I try my best to use standardized action groups to reduce pilot error, but it's not always possible. As my ship collection has gotten larger, it is sometimes difficult to remember how I set them up. When playing with the craft of others, I need to discover them. Currently, it's not possible to see a summary of action group assignments, each group much be checked individually in the action group editor.

My suggestion is to allow the renaming of each group in the editor by the player, and automatically insert a list of the keys and group names in the vessel description under the vessel name in the VAB/SPH. So after setting them up it might look like this, for example:

1 - Toggle Jets (38km)

2 - Toggle Intakes

3 - Toggle Rockets

4 - Toggle Panels

5 - Toggle Cargo Bay

6 - Release Payload Docking Clamp

7 - Activate Science Package

Bksp - Everything will be fine, I promise.

Bonus points if this list can be made available in the in-flight GUI as well.

Fixed numbering.
